entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
